characters.name: Stay Puft
characters.description: A large white monster approaches. It's round and fluffy shape resembles a child made of marshamllow. It's hat reads 'Stay Puft.'

characters.name: Blue Ghost
characters.description: A ghost approaches. It's blue hue highlights strange features.

characters.name: Green Ghost
characters.description: A ghost approaches. It's green skin stands out brightly from the dull room.

characters.name: Red Ghost
characters.description: A ghost approaches. It's red glow seems just as angry as it's monstrous face.

characters.name: Zuul the Gatekeeper
characters.description: A gatekeeper approaches, he seems to be guarding something...
